naslov: Vinišće (Uvala Lubljeva) OBJEKT SA 6 STANOVA /BAZEN/ video/ čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: - ekskluzivna prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. NAPOMENA: + VIDEO OBJEKTA I OKUĆNICE: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=quRpNit5t5A + VIDEO PLAŽE (udaljena 300 metara) https://www.youtube.com/shorts/LbyLwhsOOos + detaljni video stanova i tlocrte objekta šaljemo na upit ...................................................................................................... Samostojeća manja zgrada sa 6 apartmana (vila) u Vinišću (predio Uvala Lubljeva), udaljena svega tristotinjak metara od mora / uvale / plaže. Sam objekat je sveukupne netto površine 471.51m2 na prostranoj uređenoj okućnici od 1584m2. / ŠEST STANOVA / - trosoban 125m2 (duplex) i 130m2 - dvosoban 70m2 i 100m2 - jednosoban 2 x 60m2 + konoba, pomoćne prostorije sa praonicom, strojarnica, podrum... - gradnja 2008.godine / zadnja adaptacija 2020.godine - mogućnost gradnje dodatnog objekta na parceli 704m2 pored bazena - grijani bazen 60m2 s natkrivenom terasom od cca 35m2 - više parking mjesta - tri ulaza na parcelu / DETALJI NA UPIT / ENG.................................................................... - exclusive sale of the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% of the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. REMARK: + VIDEO OF THE FACILITY AND GROUNDS: https://youtu.be/quRpNit5t5A?feature=shared + VIDEO OF THE BEACH (300 meters away) https://www.youtube.com/shorts/LbyLwhsOOos + we send a detailed video of the apartments and floor plan of the building upon request ................................................... ................................................... .. Detached smaller building with 6 apartments (villas) in Vinišće (Uvala Lubljeva area), only three hundred meters from the sea / bay / beach. The building itself has a total net area of 471.51m2 on a spacious landscaped garden of 1584m2. / SIX APARTMENTS / - three-room 125m2 (duplex) and 130m2 - two-bedroom 70m2 and 100m2 - one bedroom 2 x 60m2 + tavern, auxiliary rooms with laundry, engine room, basement... - construction in 2008 / last renovation in 2020 - the possibility of building an additional building on a plot of 704m2 next to the swimming pool - heated swimming pool 60m2 with a covered terrace of approx. 35m2 - more parking spaces - three entrances to the plot / DETAILS ON REQUEST / #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
